column4: Hi everyone! I'm trying to run OpenSSH on my Ubuntu, so I can give "Tesla" permission to connect with my PC. But when I run the SSH, nothing happens
how are you running it and what happens? can you paste the outcome to pastebin?
I'm trying to run it via terminal
so what happens if you do what the error message suggests you to do?
I don't get the error-message... What should I do?
start: Job is already running: ssh
then it is already running, congratulations
Kind of, it is a remote
could you give an URL to that app, I'm having difficulties grasping what you are aiming at
so are you with the Tesla and the PC with ssh in the same network?
